decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly ramping mana with cards like Arboreal Grazer and Explore, using Amulet of Vigor to untap lands for explosive plays. Primeval Titan is used to search for utility lands like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Vesuva, while also generating card advantage with The Mycosynth Gardens. The goal is to assemble the combo of Amulet of Vigor, Primeval Titan, and bounce lands like Simic Growth Chamber to generate a large amount of mana and tutor for win conditions like Cultivator Colossus. The lands also provide versatility for different situations, allowing the deck to adapt and win through various strategies.

This deck focuses on using Indomitable Creativity to cheat out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty by sacrificing tokens created by Dwarven Mine, as well as utilizing Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to duplicate key cards. Wrenn and Six provide card advantage and land recursion, while Teferi, Time Raveler disrupts opposing strategies. Leyline Binding and Prismatic Ending provide removal options, and Spell Pierce offers protection. The deck also includes various dual lands and utility lands to ensure flexibility in mana fixing. Overall, the strategy centers around creating explosive combo plays that can quickly overwhelm opponents.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Tower, Urza's Mine, Urza's Power Plant) to generate a large amount of mana quickly. The deck includes powerful colorless threats like All Is Dust, Wurmcoil Engine, and Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger to dominate the battlefield. The deck also utilizes cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Ovilion Stone to control the opponent's board state. Additionally, the deck includes card draw and tutoring effects like Ancient Stirrings and Expedition Map to ensure consistency in finding key cards.

This deck focuses on assembling a toolbox of creatures that can be tutored for using cards like Chord of Calling and Yawgmoth, Thran Physician to create powerful combos and disruptive plays. The deck includes key combo pieces like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Young Wolf, along with support cards like Zulaport Cutthroat and Hapatra, Vizier of Poisons. With the ability to tutor for specific creatures and sacrifice outlets, this deck aims to out-value and outmaneuver opponents with a versatile and resilient creature-based strategy.

This deck aims to quickly fill up the graveyard with creatures, then cast Living End to bring them all back onto the battlefield. By using cards like Architects of Will, Grief, and Shardless Agent, the deck sets up a powerful board state while disrupting the opponent's game plan. The strategy revolves around constantly cycling through cards with abilities like Generous Ent, Meticulous Archive, and Curator of Mysteries to find key pieces and maintain tempo. With the ability to quickly refill the battlefield with creatures, the deck can overwhelm opponents and secure victory in a burst of explosive plays.

This deck focuses on using instant speed reanimation spells like Goryo's Vengeance and Tainted Indulgence to bring back powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier from the graveyard. It also includes disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Negation to control the opponent's game plan. Faithful Mending and Solitude provide card advantage and removal, while Ephemerate allows for additional value by blinking creatures. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats and disruptive spells.

This mono black aggro deck focuses on disrupting opponent's hand with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, while putting pressure on the board with efficient creatures like Dauthi Voidwalker and Grief. The deck also utilizes cards like The Rack and Liliana of the Veil to chip away at opponent's life total. With a mix of discard spells, removal, and threats, the deck aims to control the game and close out matches quickly. The mana base ensures consistency and efficiency in casting spells.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay, utilizing powerful early game threats like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Grief to disrupt the opponent's game plan. It also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the board while still maintaining pressure. The inclusion of cards like Dauthi Voidwalker and Pick Your Poison helps to further disrupt the opponent's strategy while also providing value for the player. This deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan to secure a quick victory.
